collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (17 total Queries, 13 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT `users`.*, `users`.`id` as `userid`, `auth_groups`.`name` as `role`, `auth_groups`.`id` as `role_id`, `kantor`.`id` as `kantor_id`, `kantor`.`nama` as `nama_kantor`, `kantor`.`slug` as `slug_kantor`, `kantor`.`kode_cabang` as `kode_kantor` FROM `users` JOIN `auth_groups_users` ON `auth_groups_users`.`user_id` = `users`.`id` JOIN `auth_groups` ON `auth_groups`.`id` = `auth_groups_users`.`group_id` JOIN `kantor` ON `kantor`.`id` = `users`.`id_kantor` WHERE `username` = 'PusatABC' LIMIT 10

queries.sql: SELECT `users`.*, `users`.`id` as `userid`, `auth_groups`.`name` as `role`, `auth_groups`.`id` as `role_id`, `kantor`.`id` as `kantor_id`, `kantor`.`nama` as `nama_kantor`, `kantor`.`slug` as `slug_kantor`, `kantor`.`kode_cabang` as `kode_kantor` FROM `users` JOIN `auth_groups_users` ON `auth_groups_users`.`user_id` = `users`.`id` JOIN `auth_groups` ON `auth_groups`.`id` = `auth_groups_users`.`group_id` JOIN `kantor` ON `kantor`.`id` = `users`.`id_kantor` WHERE `username` = 'PusatABC' LIMIT 10

SELECT COUNT(*) AS `numrows` FROM ( SELECT `penjualan`.*, `kantor`.`nama` as `nama_cabang`, `kantor`.`alamat` as `alamat_cabang`, `konsumen`.`nama` as `nama_konsumen`, `konsumen`.`alamat` as `alamat_konsumen`, `konsumen`.`kota` as `kota_konsumen`, `konsumen`.`no_telp` as `no_telp_konsumen`, `salesman`.`nama` as `nama_salesman` FROM `penjualan` JOIN `kantor` ON `kantor`.`id` = `penjualan`.`id_cabang` JOIN `konsumen` ON `konsumen`.`id` = `penjualan`.`id_konsumen` JOIN `salesman` ON `salesman`.`id` = `penjualan`.`id_salesman` JOIN `penjualan_per_produk` ON `penjualan_per_produk`.`id_penjualan` = `penjualan`.`id` WHERE DATE_FORMAT(penjualan.tanggal, "%Y-%m") = '2025-05' GROUP BY `penjualan`.`id` ) CI_count_all_results

SELECT `penjualan`.*, `kantor`.`nama` as `nama_cabang`, `kantor`.`alamat` as `alamat_cabang`, `konsumen`.`nama` as `nama_konsumen`, `konsumen`.`alamat` as `alamat_konsumen`, `konsumen`.`kota` as `kota_konsumen`, `konsumen`.`no_telp` as `no_telp_konsumen`, `salesman`.`nama` as `nama_salesman` FROM `penjualan` JOIN `kantor` ON `kantor`.`id` = `penjualan`.`id_cabang` JOIN `konsumen` ON `konsumen`.`id` = `penjualan`.`id_konsumen` JOIN `salesman` ON `salesman`.`id` = `penjualan`.`id_salesman` JOIN `penjualan_per_produk` ON `penjualan_per_produk`.`id_penjualan` = `penjualan`.`id` WHERE DATE_FORMAT(penjualan.tanggal, "%Y-%m") = '2025-05' GROUP BY `penjualan`.`id` ORDER BY `tanggal` DESC, `created_at` DESC LIMIT 10
